Description: On VA-57 East in the County of Patrick, in the vicinity of Goosepoint Rd; Rt. 822N/S (Patrick County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. Lane closures exist.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 126.3 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south exit ramp narrows.
